resources.string: From Expiry to Warranty, it\'s all here at your Fingertips. All you have to do is to Add all your Products to the app
Added Products will Automatically Sychronize between all of your Family Member\'s Devices
Recieve Notification whenever Expiry or Warranty of a Product is Approaching
As of now, We support PNG & JPEG formats only. But Fortunately, You can upload Screenshots of your PDF Invoice while adding a Product
